en.title: Due Date Calculator
en.seoTitle: Due Date Calculator - When Is My Baby Due?
en.metaDescription: Free pregnancy due date calculator. Estimate your baby's arrival date based on your last menstrual period or conception date. Track your pregnancy timeline.
en.description: Calculate your estimated pregnancy due date based on your last menstrual period or conception date.
instructions: Enter your last menstrual period date

seoContent.introduction: Our Due Date Calculator helps you estimate when your baby will arrive based on the date of your last menstrual period or conception date.

benefits.title: Accurate Estimation
benefits.description: Uses Naegele's Rule for reliable results

steps.title: Enter LMP Date
steps.description: Enter the first day of your last period

steps.title: Adjust Cycle Length
steps.description: Set your average cycle length if not 28 days

steps.title: View Results
steps.description: See your due date and pregnancy timeline

seoContent.formulaExplanation: Naegele's Rule: Add 280 days (40 weeks) to the first day of your last menstrual period, adjusted for cycle length.

examples.title: Standard Cycle
examples.description: LMP January 1 with 28-day cycle = Due October 8

examples.title: Longer Cycle
examples.description: 35-day cycle adds 7 days to the standard calculation

seoContent.whoItsFor: Pregnant women and their families wanting to estimate their baby's arrival date.
seoContent.disclaimer: This calculator provides estimates only. Consult your healthcare provider for medical advice.

faqs.question: How accurate is this calculator?
faqs.answer: Most babies are born within 2 weeks of their due date.

faqs.question: What is Naegele's Rule?
faqs.answer: A standard method adding 280 days to the first day of your last period.
